message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.SI, cs.CC, cs.SD 

The paper focuses on the social and technological context of communal technology use in smart homes, which is a topic that falls under the category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC). Additionally, the paper discusses the importance of considering social relationships and expectations, which could be categorized under Cybernetics (cs.CY) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). The paper also proposes a design perspective, which could be categorized under Computational Complexity (cs.CC) and Sound (cs.SD).
